Text:
Comedian Te Radar has made sustainability accessible, and thanks to both his farm and 1/4 acre town tenure he has shown us that modern life is filled with things that should not be taken at face value. 

So in Global Radar, he is going on a global mission to look at what we are doing to make a difference to our planet, to see how our choices impact on our backyard and those further afield. 


(http://tvnz.co.nz/global-radar/coming-up-4335075)
